ygData.subject: Fippy's Facts on Epics
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting article on the EverQuest site....  also a good way to learn what all the epic weapons are.... Fippy s Epic Quest for Epic Data Epic Weapons Fippy
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting article on the EverQuest site.... also a good way to learn
what all the epic weapons are....


Fippy's Epic Quest for Epic Data
Epic Weapons

Fippy set out to find just how many people were heroic enough to have
earned their epic weapons. He was startled to learn that over 80,000 people
are happily wielding their epic in Norrath.


Epic Weapon
Class
Number

Earthcaller and Swiftwind
Ranger
13,572

Nature Walker's Scimitar
Druid
11,470

Water Sprinkler of Nem Ankh
Cleric
10,736

Celestial Fists
Monk
10,481

Blade of Tactics, Blade of Strategy, Jagged Blade of War
Warrior
8,200

Spear of Fate
Shaman
7,677

Staff of the Four
Wizard
5,486

Staff of the Serpent
Enchanter
4,689

Orb of Mastery
Magician
2,724

Fiery Defender
Paladin
2,168

Scythe of the Shadowed Soul
Necromancer
1,734

Innoruuk's Curse
Shadowknight
1,232

Claw of the Savage Spirit
Beastmaster
1,106


TOTAL
81,275



The Ranger epic consists of two different swords. Fippy broke down the
data for each of these, too:

Epic Weapon
Number
Notes

Swiftwind
8,802
A secondary weapon

Earthcaller
4,770
A primary weapon

Both epic swords in use
4,757
---



The Warrior epic is even more complicated, consisting of two separate and
usable swords, which can be combined to create a single new epic:

Epic Weapon
Number
Notes

Blade of Strategy
3,287
A secondary weapon

Blade of Tactics
3,264
A primary weapon

Jagged Blade of War
1,649
The combined epic

Both lesser swords
2,204
Swords used independently

Well done Veeshan and Tunare! The fact that Fippy himself plays on Veeshan
is entirely a coincidence.

(Data gathered: December 2002)

Editor's note: Where are the data for the Rogue and Bard epics? Fippy
hasn't forgotten you guys. Statistics for these two classes will be
available next week, so check back here.
